app.name: QuickInstall.app
error.route_not_found.title: Oops!
error.route_not_found.description: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.
error.no_results: No results found. Try to search something else...
cart.hint: Looks like you have not added anything to your cart. Go ahead and add some!
checkout.title: Installation instructions
packages.tagline.win: The quickest and easiest way to install apps on your Windows
packages.tagline.mac: The quickest and easiest way to install apps and packages on your Mac
packages.about.title: Find once, install anywhere, with anything
packages.about.description.win: QuickInstall.app automates how you install packages and apps on your Windows. It enables safe, effortless and reproducible installations and lets you share your curations with others.
packages.about.description.mac: QuickInstall.app automates how you install packages and apps on your Mac. It enables safe, effortless and reproducible installations and lets you share your curations with others.
packages.checkout.instructions: The following selected package(s) will be installed from App Store. Please make sure you have signed in to the App Store before proceeding.
packages.checkout.copy.win: Please follow the instructions below to open an elevated Command Prompt, then copy and paste the following command to install the selected app(s).
packages.checkout.copy.mac: Please follow the instructions below to open Terminal, then copy and paste the following command to install the selected package(s).
tweaks.tagline: The quickest and easiest way to customise your macOS
tweaks.about.title: Take control of your Mac, all in one place
tweaks.about.description: QuickInstall.app lets you optimise, easily and safely, your Mac the way you want. It exposes powerful configuration options and simplifies tedious settings. It also lets you apply your tweaks on other Macs without having to set them one by one.
tweaks.checkout.instructions.1: System Integrity Protection (SIP) will need to be disabled for the following selected tweak(s):
tweaks.checkout.instructions.2: Please make sure you have disabled SIP before proceeding.
tweaks.checkout.copy: Please follow the instructions below to open Terminal, then copy and paste the following command to apply the selected tweak(s).
